meta.name: Generate & Rank Animal Advocacy Content with Claude AI, Open Paws & Hugging Face

name: Multi-Version Content Generator with AI Scoring & Advocacy Preference Ranking

options.systemPromptTemplate:
=CRITICAL: Begin your response directly with an opening curly bracket.

DO NOT begin your response with ```json, backticks, code blocks or any preamble or indication that you are about to return code.

ONLY return the code itself directly beginning with an opening curly bracket

IMPORTANT: return exactly 10 variations of the text in your given array, exactly as they appear in the user query

Use the kind of text formatting or styling that is typical of the following content type: {{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.contentType }}

parameters.content:
# üìù User Input Configuration

- Fill in these fields to customize the content generation:  
  ‚Ä¢ **Content type:** Specify the type of content to generate (e.g., blog post, email newsletter, social media caption)  
  ‚Ä¢ **Poster‚Äôs profile description:** Brief description of the poster or target audience for the content  
  ‚Ä¢ **Tone (e.g., formal, casual, friendly):** Desired tone of the content  
  ‚Ä¢ **Style (e.g., concise, detailed, persuasive):** Writing style preferences  
  ‚Ä¢ **Topic or Instructions:** Describe the main subject or specific instructions for the content

- Clear and accurate inputs help guide the research and writing process effectively.

# üîç Research Agent Usage

- This node calls the [Multi-tool Research Agent subworkflow](https://n8n.io/workflows/5588-multi-tool-research-agent-for-animal-advocacy-with-openrouter-serper-and-open-paws-db/) which:  
  ‚Ä¢ Performs focused research using Serper and the Open Paws database  
  ‚Ä¢ Gathers relevant, up-to-date information on the specified topic or organization  
  ‚Ä¢ Generates the full written content based on the research and user inputs

# üìä Text Scoring and Evaluation

- This node calls the [Evaluate Animal Advocacy Text subworkflow](https://n8n.io/workflows/5587-evaluate-animal-advocacy-text-with-hugging-face-open-paws-ai-models/) to:  
  ‚Ä¢ Analyze each content variation‚Äôs effectiveness using Open Paws AI models  
  ‚Ä¢ Score text based on real-world performance data from social media and email marketing campaigns  
  ‚Ä¢ Incorporate animal advocates‚Äô rankings on metrics such as:  
    - Impact on animal welfare  
    - Persuasiveness  
    - Emotional resonance  
    - Clarity and engagement  

- The scoring helps identify the most effective and high-impact content variations for advocacy outreach.  
- Uses Hugging Face models fine-tuned on relevant datasets to predict audience response and optimize messaging.

# üì¶ Final Aggregation & Output

- This node combines the content variations with their corresponding:  
  ‚Ä¢ Performance scores (based on real-world analytics)  
  ‚Ä¢ Prediction scores (from Open Paws preference models tuned by animal advocates)

- Designed as a subworkflow output, enabling seamless integration into other n8n flows for:  
  ‚Ä¢ Automated posting of top-performing content  
  ‚Ä¢ AI agent decision-making on content selection  
  ‚Ä¢ Scheduling and managing advocacy campaigns with data-driven messaging  

- Empowers users to maximize impact by prioritizing content proven effective and favored by animal advocacy experts.

json.Topic or Instructions: Explain recent advances in animal welfare legislation and how readers can support the movement.
